name: Ahmed
bio: Chef Ahmed is a seasoned cook with 10 years of experience. He has created 25 delicious recipes that are loved by his fans, with over 500 likes on his profile.

recipes.name: Chicken kabsa
recipes.method:
1. Heat oil in a pan and fry onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chicken and cook until browned.
3. Add spices and coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes.
4. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Chicken Mandi
recipes.method:
1. Heat butter in a pan and fry onions and garlic.
2. Add rice and stir for a few minutes.
3. Add white wine and cook until absorbed.
4. Add mushrooms and broth, stir occasionally until rice is cooked.
5. Add parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Beef With Arabic Spice
recipes.method:
1. Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
2. Season beef with paprika, salt, and pepper, and fry until browned.
3. Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic, and cook until softened.
4. Add flour and beef broth, and simmer until thickened.
5. Add sour cream and season to taste.
6. Serve over egg noodles.
